item.description: The show runs from 12 to the 16th. I plan on going over on Sunday the 15th @ 11am. We could meet by the box office and then go around. Hours: Thursday, January 12, 12:00 PM - 9:00 PM Friday, January 13, 12:00 PM - 9:00 PM Saturday, January 14, 10:00 AM - 9:00 PM Sunday, January 15, 10:00 AM - 7:00 PM Monday, January 16, 10:00 AM - 6:00 PM Box Office closes 1 hour prior to the end of the Show each day. Admission: Adults $12.00 Children (6-12) $6.00 Children under 6 Free http://www.paragonexp...
item.name: 2012 New England International Auto Show
